name: New Zealand Airline Academy
about: New Zealand Airline Academy Limited (NZAAL), located in Oamaru, New Zealand, is dedicated to transforming aspiring aviators into airline-ready professionals. Founded by aviation professionals with over three decades of experience, NZAAL offers advanced flight training programs using a brand-new fleet of aircraft with glass cockpits and touchscreens. Students benefit from training on a B73 flight simulator and MCC programs, as well as full boarding and lodging facilities. With a strong focus on safety and quality, NZAAL provides a vibrant and supportive environment, ensuring students are well-prepared for a thriving career in aviation. NZAAL is committed to helping you reach your aviation goals.
services:
["Private Pilot Licence
Commercial Pilot Licence
Instrument Rating
Instructor Rating (C Cat)
Frozen ATPL"]
